dict.acceptation: 普通的；通俗的；[数学]公共的；共有的；
[法律]（对土地、水域的）共有权；公共用地；普通；平民；

sent.orig: This paper describes how to realize COMMON-ISDN-API (CAPI) and the layered driver for ISDN Terminal Adapter.
sent.trans: 本文对通用ISDN（综合业务数字网）应用程序接口规范(CAPI:COMMON-ISDN-API)以及ISDNTA(Terminal Adapter)分层驱动程序进行了研究开发。

sent.orig: Therefore use common words and common meanings. Write for the common man and the common woman.
sent.trans: 因此，要使用普通的词语表达普通的意思，为普通人撰写合同。

sent.orig: Common sense is not sense common to everyone, but sense in common things.
sent.trans: 常识不是人人都有的知识，而是关于常见事物的知识。

sent.orig: Common sense, common care, common prudence, were all sunk in Mrs. Dashwood's romantic delicacy.
sent.trans: 一般人常有的理智、关心和谨慎统统渗入到达什伍德太太的浪漫、柔弱的思想中去了。

sent.orig: My life was the common kind, with common desires and fears.
sent.trans: 我的一生曾经与市井无异，有同一样的欲望和恐惧。
